00011010:
CLS11010:
00011110:
00001011:
00000001:
00101111:BUTTON 1
00001011:
00000010:
01001111:BUTTON 2
00001011:
00000011:
01101111:BUTTON 3
00001011:
00000100:
10001111:BUTTON 4
00001011:
00000101:
10101111:BUTTON 5
00001011:
00000110:
11001111:BUTTON 6
00001011:
00000111:
11101111:BUTTON 7
00001011:
00001000:
10010000:BUTTON 8
00001011:
00001001:
10110000:BUTTON 9
00001011:
00000001:LOAD X
01100100:X "TURN" IN RAM 8
00011010:PROGRAM START
00001110:READ USER INPUT
00000011:SAVE TO RAM 0
00000101:LOAD INTO IF "A"
01111000:CLEAR USER BUTTON PRESS FROM BUS
00001011:CHECK FOR INPUT 1
01100110:
00101010:
00001011:
00000001:
00000110:
01001100:
00001011:CHECK FOR INPUT 2
10101010:

00001011:
00001001:
00000110:
01001100:
00011111:SOMETHING WENT WROUNG!! IF HERE
00011010:JUMPED FROM 1
00100001:LOAD SPACE 1
00000101:
00111000:CLEAR RAM OUTPUT
00001011:
00100001:33 IS HOME
00101010:
10101100:RETURN TO USER INPUT ON FAIL
00011010:
01100010:READ TURN FROM RAM
00000101:
00111000:CLEAR RAM OUTPUT
00001011:
10001111:JUMP TO X DRAW FOR 1
00101010:
00001011:
00000001:FOR X
00000110:
01001100:JUMPS TO X IF X
00011010:DRAW O START
00001011:
00010010:
00010001:
00001011:
00100001:

00001011:
00100011:
00010001:
00001011:
00110010:
00010001:DRAW O ENDS
00001011:
00001000:
00100011:WRITE MOVE TO RAM PLACE 1
00001011:
00000001:
01100100:CHANGE TURN TO X
00001011:
00100001:
00101010:
